snippet: United, an 11-time F.A. Cup winner, cruised past third-tier Shrewsbury to provide some relief for its heavily criticized manager, Louis van Gaal....

headline.main: Manchester United Reaches F.A. Cup Quarterfinals

abstract: Manchester United beats Shrewsbury Town, 3-0, in FA Cup match; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: United, an 11-time F.A. Cup winner, cruised past third-tier Shrewsbury to provide some relief for its heavily criticized manager, Louis van Gaal.

snippet: Aston Villa's transfer targets have rejected moves to the Premier League's bottom club this month, manager Remi Garde said on Tuesday....

headline.main: Transfer Targets Rejecting Villa, Says Garde
headline.print_headline: Transfer Targets Rejecting Villa, Says Garde

lead_paragraph: Aston Villa's transfer targets have rejected moves to the Premier League's bottom club this month, manager Remi Garde said on Tuesday.

snippet: Sunderland have signed Spanish defender Javier Manquillo from Atletico Madrid on a season-long loan, the Premier League club said on Thursday....

headline.main: Sunderland Sign Spanish Defender Manquillo on Season-Long Loan
headline.print_headline: Sunderland Sign Spanish Defender Manquillo on Season-Long Loan

lead_paragraph: Sunderland have signed Spanish defender Javier Manquillo from Atletico Madrid on a season-long loan, the Premier League club said on Thursday.

snippet: Defender Patrick van Aanholt has signed a new four-year deal at Sunderland, which will keep him at the Stadium of Light until 2020, the Premier League club said on Wednesday....

headline.main: Van Aanholt Extends Contract With Sunderland to 2020
headline.print_headline: Van Aanholt Extends Contract With Sunderland to 2020

lead_paragraph: Defender Patrick van Aanholt has signed a new four-year deal at Sunderland, which will keep him at the Stadium of Light until 2020, the Premier League club said on Wednesday.

snippet: West Ham United will welcome back defender Aaron Cresswell and midfielder Michail Antonio for Sunday's Premier League trip to Liverpool, but Cheikhou Kouyate will miss the game....

headline.main: West Ham's Antonio, Creswell Back for Liverpool Trip
headline.print_headline: West Ham's Antonio, Creswell Back for Liverpool Trip

lead_paragraph: West Ham United will welcome back defender Aaron Cresswell and midfielder Michail Antonio for Sunday's Premier League trip to Liverpool, but Cheikhou Kouyate will miss the game.

snippet: Crystal Palace have signed midfielder Mathieu Flamini on a one-year contract, the Premier League club announced on Thursday....

headline.main: Crystal Palace Sign Former Arsenal Midfielder Flamini
headline.print_headline: Crystal Palace Sign Former Arsenal Midfielder Flamini

lead_paragraph: Crystal Palace have signed midfielder Mathieu Flamini on a one-year contract, the Premier League club announced on Thursday.

snippet: Manchester City's out-of-favour goalkeeper Joe Hart is keen to join Serie A club Torino on a season-long loan deal, media reports said on Monday....

headline.main: City Keeper Hart Wants to Join Torino on Loan-Reports
headline.print_headline: City Keeper Hart Wants to Join Torino on Loan-Reports

lead_paragraph: Manchester City's out-of-favour goalkeeper Joe Hart is keen to join Serie A club Torino on a season-long loan deal, media reports said on Monday.

snippet: West Ham defender Reece Burke signed a new four-year contract on Monday, tying him to the Premier League club until 2020....

headline.main: West Ham Defender Burke Signs New Four-Year Contract
headline.print_headline: West Ham Defender Burke Signs New Four-Year Contract

lead_paragraph: West Ham defender Reece Burke signed a new four-year contract on Monday, tying him to the Premier League club until 2020.

snippet: Belgian winger Adnan Januzaj has joined Sunderland on a season-long loan from fellow Premier League side Manchester United, the two clubs said on Friday....

headline.main: Januzaj Joins Sunderland on Season-Long Loan
headline.print_headline: Januzaj Joins Sunderland on Season-Long Loan

lead_paragraph: Belgian winger Adnan Januzaj has joined Sunderland on a season-long loan from fellow Premier League side Manchester United, the two clubs said on Friday.

snippet: Crystal Palace forward Connor Wickham has been handed a three-match ban for elbowing Tottenham Hotspur's Belgium defender Jan Vertonghen in last weekend's Premier League game, the FA said on Friday....

headline.main: Crystal Palace Forward Wickham Suspended for Three Games
headline.print_headline: Crystal Palace Forward Wickham Suspended for Three Games

lead_paragraph: Crystal Palace forward Connor Wickham has been handed a three-match ban for elbowing Tottenham Hotspur's Belgium defender Jan Vertonghen in last weekend's Premier League game, the FA said on Friday.
